# docker_hub_repository_tags (Data Source)

Lists tags for a Docker Hub repository.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The repository name.
- `namespace` (String) The Docker Hub namespace (username or organization name).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this data source.
- `tags` (Attributes List) List of tags in the repository. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tags))

<a id="nestedatt--tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tags`

Read-Only:

- `digest` (String) The digest of the image.
- `full_size` (Number) The full size of the image in bytes.
- `last_updated` (String) When the tag was last updated.
- `name` (String) The tag name.
